elements.name: Verify related project link for executed idea

steps.name: I want to open browser
I want to maximize window
I want to go to OOB
I want to verify I'm in OOB main page
I want to go to ideas list page
I want to click on Add New button
I want to fill idea name field
I want to select expected start date
I want to select expected end date
I want to fill idea objective field
I want to fill expected budget field
I want to fill Notes field
I want to click send idea button
I want to verify idea added successfuly
I want to approve idea
I want to go to OOB
I want to go to approved ideas list page

steps.name: I want to search for approved idea by name
I want to click Excute button
I want to verify im in add new project page
I want to select project type
I want to fill project manager field
I want to tap enter key on manager field
I want to fill project owner field
I want to tap enter key on owner field
I want to fill project sponser field
I want to tap enter key on sponser field
I want to fill project description field
I want to fill project notes field
I want to wait
I want to click on send project button
I want to wait for page load
I want to check im in projects list page
I want to search for project by name
I want to go to approved ideas list page
I want to search for approved idea by name
I want to click on related project link
I want to verify Project Charter page
I want to close browser

name: Verify related project link for executed idea
